about_the_game:
You'll find yourself in a motel in the middle of nowhere. But this ordinary night is about to turn into a nightmare. Immerse yourself in the environment around you, explore its history and lore, interact with its people, and solve puzzles in your search for the truth as to how – and why – you ended up here. Your singular goal, to escape this hellish place – or so it seems at first...


Game features:

- Story focused experience - An ordinary-looking scene will throw you into the dark past of the place, top-secret military base and some unexplainable mysteries that you never expected to witness

- Immersive Experience - From the graphics and the environments, the actions of you and the others. Logical puzzles and riddles that can actually happen in real life

- Initiative AI - changing and adapting system dependable of your decisions

- Captivating atmosphere - An environment with its own character and impact supported with the sound design that enhances the whole atmosphere.

- Stealth gameplay - You`re an ordinary guy and if you want to survive you`ll need to avoid the enemies. Sneak, run and hide.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence, which could be found disturbing.  Some of its content may not be appropriate for all ages. Player discretion is advised.

name: Black Room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Black Room is a first-person psychological horror game focused on story and experience. What starts as a night in a motel will pull you deep within the human psyche, leaving you grasping for an exit – and not only for yourself.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Korean
*languages with full audio support
